job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: <p>Are you a Senior Data Scientist that wants to work in one of the hottest startups in NYC right now? A company that was just voted one of the best places to work for in NYC? How about being part of a close knit Data Science team, building the infrastructure for Machine Learning models to run off? Sounds awesome right! Keep reading...</p><p><br></p><p><strong>What's The Job?</strong></p><p>As the first&nbsp;Senior Data Scientist at you'll&nbsp;help reinvent how people shop by building machine learning-based recommendations systems using large amounts of data to predict user behavior. This is a highly visible and impactful role and you will be collaborating daily with the data engineering team, product teams and other functional areas.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Who Are We?</strong></p><p>We&nbsp;create 'white-label' personalized e-commerce solutions for our clients to achieve predictable and recurring revenue. We enable our clients to move away from transactional commerce, and instead offer a true relationship commerce that their customers can't live without.</p><p>&nbsp;We are 75+ team members right now, and are looking to scale to over 100 in the next 12 months as our growth / client acquisition demands it. We are located in downtown Manhattan, close to all the major subway lines.</p><p><br></p><p><strong>What Skills Do You Need?</strong></p><p>&nbsp;• 3+ years of experience in a data science role helping companies innovate products forward using machine learning</p><p>• Excellent knowledge of Machine Learning/Statistical Modeling &amp; Testing</p><p>• Python&nbsp;</p><p>• MA/MS in statistics, mathematics, computer science, economics, or another quantitative field</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Nice to haves:</strong></p><p>• Experience with R</p><p>• Experience with GCP, Spark</p><p>• E-Commerce experience</p><p>• SaaS experience&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><strong>Compensation</strong></p><p>• $130k - 180k&nbsp;base salary.</p><p>• Fully Remote</p><p>• Substantial stock grants.</p><p>• Awesome benefits package including unlimited PTO!</p><p>• Lots of company wide outings and perks to keep things fun!</p>
